name: macos-git-automation
description: Automate Git operations on macOS via AppleScript, JavaScript, and Bash

scripts.test: echo 'Running tests for all implementations' && npm run test:bash && npm run test:applescript && npm run test:javascript
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp src/javascript/*.js dist/ && cp src/applescript/*.applescript dist/ && cp src/bash/*.sh dist/ && chmod +x dist/*.sh

author: Thomas Vincent
